meanings.definition: A large ship designed to carry containers.
meanings.sent1: The containerships sailed across the ocean with ease.
meanings.sent2: The containerships unloaded their cargo at the port.
meanings.sent3: The containerships had a party on deck to celebrate a successful voyage.
meanings.sent4: The containerships were like floating warehouses on the sea.
meanings.sent5: The containerships loomed large against the horizon, a marvel of modern engineering.

meanings.definition: The act of transporting goods in containerships.
meanings.sent1: The containerships' journey was smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent2: Containerships play a crucial role in global trade.
meanings.sent3: The containerships raced each other to see who could deliver first.
meanings.sent4: The containerships plowed through the waves, carrying precious cargo.
meanings.sent5: The containerships' arrival signaled the start of bustling activity at the port.

meanings.sent1: Working in the containerships industry requires specialized skills.
meanings.sent2: The containerships industry is constantly evolving.
meanings.sent3: The containerships industry held a conference to discuss new technologies.
meanings.sent4: Investing in the containerships industry can be lucrative.
meanings.sent5: The containerships industry supports thousands of jobs worldwide.
